Name: Flora Garden Beach Side
Description:
The main swimming pool upside the beach is located with a wonderful view of the Mediterranean Sea. Providing our guests with the privilege to rest and sunbath while enjoying our exquisite architecture. Our fantastic garden awaits you  in the east of the hotel, a secret heaven embellished with the philosophy of Zen and situated on a vast area of around 5000 m2. The garden offers an enchanting atmosphere with waterfalls and ponds surrounded by the breathtaking nature.
The hotel rooms are offered to you with elegant decoration accompanied by unique Mediterranean flora. With your comfort in mind we have projected and designed a variety of rooms to suit all our guest requirements. For our guests interested in enjoying alternative options, you can try our À  La Carte restaurants with a fantastic selection of seafood, traditional local Anatolian food, steak house, far east cuisine, and Teppanyaki. The modern decoration solely designed for grown-ups (Adults only concept 16+), our intention is to create the perfect atmosphere for your enjoyment while leaving you with unforgettable memories of your vacation.
